message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product at a price of $12,000. I believe this product would be very valuable to you, and this is a fair price.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this product. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for it. Can you consider this price?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand you're looking for a good deal.  While I value your interest, $9,500 is a bit too low for me to accept.  Could you do $11,000? That would make it worth it for me.
Hi Alice, I understand that you're looking for a better price, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $10,750. Can you consider this price?
